name: Aruma
description: Aruma was rescued in a rural valley 5 hours drive from the city of La Paz. Some dogs chased and scared his mother, who managed to escape with one of her cubs. Unfortunately Aruma stayed behind. He was three (3) months old and the person who found him offered him for sale. He is a 428 Lbs. (192 kls.) handsome, strong and calm bear, very attentive to who visits him.
